 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פָּרַר‎</span>] **verb Hiph\`il** ==break, frustrate== (Late Hebrew Pi\`el ***crumble***; Jewish-Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎פְּרַר‎</span>; Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***parâru***</u></abbr>, ***destroy***; II. ***shatter***; Lihyanian <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎והפרו‎</span> ***destroy***, [[BDB#DHM|DHM]]<sup>Epigr. Denkm., No. 21, 7</sup>); — ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הֵפֵר‎</span> [[Isa.33.8|Isa 33:8]] +, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הֵפַ֑ר‎</span> [[Gen.17.14|Gen 17:14]]; [[Num.15.31|Num 15:31]] also metaplastic from <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הֵפִיר‎</span> [[Ezek.17.19|Ezek 17:19]]; [[Ps.33.10|Ps 33:10]] ([[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:67v»§ 67v</sup>); 2 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְהֵפַרְדָמתּ֫ה‎</span> [[2Sam.15.34|2Sam 15:34]], etc., ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יָפֵר‎</span> [[Num.30.13|Num 30:13]] +, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיָּפֶר‎</span> [[Neh.4.9|Neh 4:9]], etc.; also 1 singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אָפִיר‎</span> [[Ps.89.34|Ps 89:34]] ([[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>i.c</sup>.); ***Imperative*** masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הָפֵר‎</span> [[2Chr.16.3|2Chr 16:3]]; [[Ps.85.5|Ps 85:5]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הָפֵרָה‎</span> [[1Kgs.15.19|1Kgs 15:19]] ***Infinitive*** absolute <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הָפֵר‎</span> [[Prov.15.22|Prov 15:22]] +; construct <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְהָפֵר‎</span> [[2Sam.17.14|2Sam 17:14]] +, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְהָפֵיר‎</span> [[Zech.11.10|Zech 11:10]], suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְהַפְרְכֶם‎</span> [[Lev.26.15|Lev 26:15]] ([[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:67dd»§ 67dd</sup>); ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֵפֵר‎</span> [[Isa.44.25|Isa 44:25]]; [[Job.5.12|Job 5:12]] — 

**1.** ***break, violate***, especially with accusative <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּרִית‎</span>: 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **a.** of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span> [[Judg.2.1|Judg 2:1]]; [[Jer.14.21|Jer 14:21]]; [[Lev.26.44|Lev 26:44]]; [[Zech.11.10|Zech 11:10]]. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **b.** of men violating covenant with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span> [[Jer.11.10|Jer 11:10]]; [[Jer.31.32|Jer 31:32]]; [[Deut.31.16|Deut 31:16]]; [[Deut.31.20|Deut 31:20]]; [[Lev.26.15|Lev 26:15]]; [[Ezek.44.7|Ezek 44:7]]; [[Gen.17.14|Gen 17:14]]; [[Isa.24.5|Isa 24:5]] compare [[Jer.33.20|Jer 33:20]]. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **c.** of men breaking compact, league (with men), [[Isa.33.8|Isa 33:8]]; [[1Kgs.15.19|1Kgs 15:19]] = [[2Chr.16.3|2Chr 16:3]]; [[Ezek.17.15|Ezek 17:15]]; [[Ezek.17.16|Ezek 17:16]]; [[Ezek.17.18|Ezek 17:18]]; [[Ezek.17.19|Ezek 17:19]]. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **d.** of destroying the <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אַחֲוָה‎</span> between Judah and Israel [[Zech.11.14|Zech 11:14]]. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **e.** of breaking <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>'s <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִצְוָה‎</span> [[Num.15.31|Num 15:31]]; [[Ezra.9.14|Ezra 9:14]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תּוֺרָה‎</span> [[Ps.119.126|Ps 119:126]]. 

**2.** ***frustrate, make ineffectual:***: 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **a.** counsel (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֵצָה‎</span>) [[2Sam.15.34|2Sam 15:34]]; [[2Sam.17.14|2Sam 17:14]]; [[Ezra.4.5|Ezra 4:5]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span> subject [[Neh.4.9|Neh 4:9]]; [[Ps.33.10|Ps 33:10]] of man frustrating <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>'s counsel [[Isa.14.27|Isa 14:27]], so, with accusative <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִשְׁפָּט‎</span> [[Job.40.8|Job 40:8]] with accusative <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַחֲשָׁבוֺת‎</span> in general, of men [[Prov.15.22|Prov 15:22]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span> subject [[Job.15.12|Job 15:12]] so, with accusative <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֹתוֺת‎</span> [[Isa.44.25|Isa 44:25]]. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **b.** ***make*** vow (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נֶדֶר‎</span>) ***ineffectual, annul*** it [[Num.30.9|Num 30:9]]; [[Num.30.14|Num 30:14]] (opposed to <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חֵקִים‎</span>), v.[[Num.30.13|Num 30:13]], also (Imperfect + Infinitive absolute) v.[[Num.30.13|Num 30:13]]; [[Num.30.16|Num 30:16]]. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **c.** of annulling (godly) fear [[Job.15.4|Job 15:4]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חַסְדִּי לֹא אָפִיר מֵעִמּוֺ‎</span>, [[Ps.89.34|Ps 89:34]] read probably <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אָסִיר‎</span> [[BDB#Ol|Ol]] [[BDB#Che|Che]] [[BDB#Bae|Bae]] and others; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הָפֵר כַּעַסְךָ‎</span> [[Ps.85.4|Ps 85:4]] (read <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הָסֵר‎</span> [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] [[BDB#Bi|Bi]] [[BDB#Che|Che]]). 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **d.** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְתָפֵר הָאֲבֵיּוֺנָה‎</span> [[Eccl.12.5|Eccl 12:5]] is dubious: [[BDB#De|De]] [[BDB#Wild|Wild]] and others ***fails*** (to excite [? <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְתֻפַר‎</span> **Hoph\`al** ***is made ineffectual***]); [[BDB#Ew|Ew]] ***bursts*** ([[BDB#Siegf|Siegf]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְתֻפַר‎</span>); but caper-berry not dehiscent ([[BDB#Post|Post]]<sup>Flora of Syr. 106 ff.</sup>); M'Lean-Dyer<sup>Ency. Bid. 696.</sup>): [[BDB#Post|Post]]<sup>Letter, July 28, 1901</sup> ***breaks up*** (by shrivelling), figurative of failing sexual power; [[BDB#Aq|Aq]] from <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פרה‎</span> ***bear fruit*** (compare [[BDB#GFM|GFM]]<sup>JBL x (1891), 60</sup>); [[BDB#Perles|Perles]]<sup>Anal. 30</sup> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְתִפְרַח‎</span>. **Hoph\`al** ***Imperfect*** 

**1.** ***be frustratred***, 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְתֻפָ֑ר‎</span> [[Isa.8.10|Isa 8:10]] (of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֵצָה‎</span>). 

**2.** ***be broken***, of covenant, 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תֻּפַר‎</span> [[Jer.33.21|Jer 33:21]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וִתֻּפַר‎</span> [[Zech.11.11|Zech 11:11]] so [[Isa.28.18|Isa 28:18]] (read <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְתֻפַר‎</span> for <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְכֻפַּר‎</span>, see <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כ‎</span>). **Pilpel** ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיְפַרְפְּרֵנִי‎</span> [[Job.16.12|Job 16:12]] ***he hath shattered me. ***



 II. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פָּרַר‎</span>] **verb** ==split, divide== (so [[Ps.74.13|Ps 74:13]] seems to require [but √ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פור‎</span> [[BDB#SS|SS]] is possible], compare Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***split, tear, rend***; perhaps = I.; &gt; [[BDB#Buhl|Buhl]]<sup>Lex.</sup> ***shake, quike, citing*** Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***shake*** Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎אִתְפַּרְפַּר‎</span>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, compare Late Hebrew <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פִּרְפֵּר‎</span>); — 

**Qal** ***Infinitive absolute*** + **Hithpo\`el**. ***Perfect*** 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פּוֺר הִתְפּוֺרְרָה אֶרֶץ‎</span> [[Isa.24.19|Isa 24:19]] ***split or cracked through is the earth*** ([[BDB#Che|Che]]<sup>Heb.Hpt.</sup> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פרוק התפרקה‎</span>). **Po\`êl** ***Perfect*** 2 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פּוֺרַרְתָּ‎</span> [[Ps.74.13|Ps 74:13]] ***thou*** [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>] ***didst divide*** the sea.
